overview:
SAP Online Training @ Marks Solutions – 100 % Job Assistance

Marks Solutions, Is one of the best Online Training & Corporate Training center for the following IT Courses:

We offer access to live SAP systems to all our clients/students for hands-on practice. We also offer complete training materials and everything you need to make your learning a breeze. Our SAP Training classes are scheduled normally at a time that best suites you. For your current SAP training Schedule for SAP Online Training please visit www.markssolutions.com

SAP Courses: ————————————- SAP ABAP HR-ABAP ABAP Webdynpro ABAP OOPS ABAP Workflow SD CRM 7.0 Functional / Technical MM SRM 7.0 PP APO HR FICO FSCM BI 7.0 PI 7.1 POS Data Management BOBJ 4.0 MDM 7.1 BASIS Security GRC HANA Solution Manager 7.1 EP 7.0 & BPC 10 Trainings

Other IT Courses We have: ————————————- Oracle SQL / PL SQL Oracle DBA SAS Salesforce.com CRM IBM MQ ( Message Queue ) IBM MB ( Message Broker ) JAVA/J2EE

Please go through the following link for the information on each module: http://www.markssolutions.com/online-training/course-catalog

Hands-on Interactive SAP Online Training available 24/7! ——————————————————————————— Our SAP Online Training Courses are Virtual, Instructor Led & Interactive Sessions put together by SAP Professionals with many years of hands-on-consulting experience.

Remote Consulting: —————————- Sometimes all you need is an hour or two of an SAP Expert’s time to solve a small issue. We offer our Remote Consulting service in small hourly increments at affordable rates. Simply purchase some consulting time and then schedule your Remote Consulting session with us.

Is Online Training right for me? ——————————————— Successful online learners are self-motivated, responsible, and able to manage their time well.

Why you should choose us? ——————————————– • Free demo session and on request • Hands on experience • Highly experienced Instructors • Excellent course material with tutorials • Unlimited lab access • Limited class size • Interview preparation and Placement Assistance • Support when you are on project • Resume discussion and mock interviews • Test and assignments to evaluate the performance of the candidate • Interview and job oriented curriculum. Also helpful in preparing for various certification courses • Flexible training sessions - Crash course can be given

Thanks & Regards,
